item.title: My Personal Git Cheat Sheet
item.description: What is GIT? Git is a free and open source distributed version control system. Why we use VCS (version control system)? Code Revision Like a Time Machine Multiple Developer Why GIT (among other VCS)? Can work locally without any central server Setup Now let’s install Git on our machine and start using it. Installation Please follow the offical doc to install git. Configuration Use git config command to get and set configuration variables
